item.title: What if Bernie Sanders Had Raised Money for Blockchain Startups Instead
item.description:
What if Bernie Sanders Had Raised Money for Blockchain Startups Instead

Bernie Sanders led an impressive campaign run mostly off of small donations, though he failed to help the poor. If he had invested that money in cryptocurrency, the world would be a much better place.

item.title: Plutus Tap & Pay Raises $1 Million in Crowdfunding - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Plutus Tap & Pay Raises $1 Million in Crowdfunding - NEWSBTC

Plutus, the London-based cryptocurrency payment platform has raised over 1 million within 9 days of launching the crowdfunding campaign. Read more... Plutus, the Tap & Pay contactless cryptocurrency payment solution provider has successfully raised over $1 million in less than 10 days.

item.title: Ethereum Classic, Blockchain Investments and Charlie Shrem Freed. Cryptospace News, July 17 - 24
item.description:
Ethereum Classic, Blockchain Investments and Charlie Shrem Freed. Cryptospace News, July 17 - 24

Ethereum hard fork and advent of Ethereum Classic, the ecosystem of bitcoin and altcoins, state regulation and private business's interest towards blockchain technology, as well as a few stories from the dark side - all in ForkLog's traditional weekly overview. This week kicked off with a slight decrease of bitcoin's market price.

item.title: Ethereum Hard Fork Gives Birth to a New 'Classic' Coin
item.description:
Ethereum Hard Fork Gives Birth to a New 'Classic' Coin

The Ethereum community had a hard fork this past week, and many celebrated a successful implementation. However, not everyone was enthusiastic about the fork as it only received 85% of the network's hashing power.

item.title: Ethereum Classic Jumps Into Top 10 Altcoins In Less Than a Day - Bitcoinist.net
item.description:
Ethereum Classic Jumps Into Top 10 Altcoins In Less Than a Day - Bitcoinist.net

The Ethereum Hard-Fork has been a highly divisive event on the cryptocurrency landscape. The hard fork, along with a rescue soft-fork in the weeks prior, has been a godsend to those who invested in The DAO, a smart contract built on Ethereum that ended in one of the most catastrophic implosions in Crypto history.

item.title: BitPay Upgrades Design, Introduces Modal Invoice - NEWSBTC
item.description:
BitPay Upgrades Design, Introduces Modal Invoice - NEWSBTC

BitPay has introduced a new modal invoice feature to improve the user experience for users making bitcoin payments on BitPay supported merchant sites.

item.title: Cryptocurrency Prices Rise As G20 Prepares For Global Economy Meeting
item.description:
Cryptocurrency Prices Rise As G20 Prepares For Global Economy Meeting

The G20 has a concrete plan to make sure any negative impact by the Brexit can be nipped in the bud at an early stage. Despite their good ideas, the actual defenses against recession will have to be bolstered first.

item.title: Beyond The Hype: What Blockchain Really Bring To Payments
item.description:
Beyond The Hype: What Blockchain Really Bring To Payments

Banks have not prepared to retain control of customers and merchant payment interfaces in the face of blockchain or distributed ledger, according to managing consultant firm Bain & Company white paper. Such technology removes intermediaries, simplifies counterparty connections and records data in a tamper-proof manner.

item.title: Tor Project Loses Top Contributor And Bridge Authority Feature
item.description:
Tor Project Loses Top Contributor And Bridge Authority Feature

The Tor project continues to make headlines all over the world, even though the news is rather mixed these days. The most recent update regarding Tor saw one of their veteran contributors leave the project after shutting down a critical network node.
